description: Gold standard test set for extraction accuracy measurement

leases.description: Sample office lease - Tech Center Plaza (3-page truncated version)

gold_standard.parties.tenant_address: 123 Business Park, Suite 100, San Francisco, CA 94105
gold_standard.rent.rent_escalations: 3% annually on each anniversary of the Commencement Date
gold_standard.rights.renewal_options: Two 12-month options with 180 days advance notice

notes: This is a truncated 3-page lease sample
Fields set to null are NOT present in the PDF (not extraction errors)
Missing: signature page, exhibits, maintenance section, permitted use clause, parking
Updated to match actual PDF content - many fields are genuinely not present
This tests extraction accuracy on available content, not hallucination
For full lease testing, use a complete lease document with all sections
